category.name: Data Sharing.Multi-Site Collaboration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_always_exclude_dataset_files_on_export
preference.preference_description: Determines whether the dataset named reference file is excluded from export. Use this preference in conjunction with the on-demand retrieval of dataset volume files functionality. This preference affects Multi-Site transfers only and is ignored by Global Services. Valid Values: true - Excludes the dataset named reference file from export. This ensures a given role can never store replica volume data at a remote site. This setting forces the remote user to retrieve the volume data from the owning site. false - Does not exclude the dataset named reference file from export.
